body: It appears it would affect 6.x as well.

issue.title: symfony-52273 [doctrine-messenger] DB table locks on messenger_messag…
issue.body:
…es with many failures

| Q             | A
| ------------- | ---
| Branch?       | 5.4

Reorder Query for doctrine-messenger to limit on `queue_name` first.

issue.title: [Messenger] Retries in DoctrineTransport cause growing envelope size

labels.name: Help wanted
labels.description: Issues and PRs which are looking for volunteers to complete them.

issue.title: DB table locks on messenger_messages with many failures
issue.body:
| Q             | A
| ------------- | ---
| Branch?       | 5.4
| Bug fix?      | yes
| New feature?  | no
| Deprecations? | no
| Issues        | Fix #52273 
| License       | MIT

This reorders the query to target the `queue_name` first and not include any `failed` messages in the first part of the `WHERE` clause to help performance.
